page.title: 16POPULATION 1 BIRTHS/DEATHS
page.content: Population depends upon three main factors, birth rate, migration and death rate.{ {BIRTHS:}20% of mothers were under 20 years old, 60% were between 21 and 30 years and 20% were over 30. 60% of mothers were having their first baby. There are 2 Health Clinics in the area. {DEATHS:}There are two graveyards and a crematorium. In the last decade persons interred here have included 5 under the age of 5, 1 between 6 and 10, 10 between 11 and 18, 6 between 19 and 25, 8 between 26 and 40, 137 between 41 and 65 and 419 over 66 (2/3 of these were women). These figures may also include non residents. The main cause of death is stated as being from natural causes. { {See POPULATION 2 MIGRATION/EMPLOYMENT}
